otp.label: Input your code

wishlist.title: Wishlist
wishlist.notFound: You have no items in your wish list
wishlist.warningDelete: Are you sure delete this item from wish list?
wishlist.addAllToBagSuccess: Success add all wish list item to cart
wishlist.addPartToBagSuccess: Success add $ item wishlist to cart but not all item without selected configurable product
wishlist.failedAddToBagOption: Please select option for some product

address.useBilling: use as my default billing address
address.useShipping: use as my default shipping address
